GT Capital Holdings Inc Pref B Company Profile

GT Capital Holdings, Inc. is a Philippines-based company that provides banking, automotive assembly, importation and distribution, property development, infrastructure and utilities, and life and general insurance services. The Company operates through five segments, which includes Real Estate, Financial Institution, Automotive Operations, Infrastructure and Others. Real Estate is engaged in real estate and leasing, development and selling of properties, as well as trading of goods, engaging in food and restaurant service and acting as a marketing agent. Financial Institutions are engaged in the banking and insurance industry, and financing institution. Automotive operations are engaged in the assembly, manufacture, importation, sale and distribution of all kinds of automobiles, including automobile parts, accessories and instruments. Infrastructure is engaged in the water distribution, toll operation, power sector, hospitals and rail. Read More
